reviewText:
Since I'm the first to review this, let me summarize it a bit as the current description is lacking.  This is basically a compilation video of 7 different burlesque dancers/strippers all performing at (what appears to be) the same club.  There is a live audience and music to accompany the girls.  The dancers names are Tiffany, Venus, Paula, Aida, Katlyn, and Dawn, with Kitten serving as the headliner.  She also makes interlude-style appearances in between the different dancers' sets and introduces them before they come on. Each set is about 7 minutes long, and as a finale, all the dancers join Kitten on the floor.  Kitten appears fully dressed for her first interlude appearance and by the last one, she is almost nude, with her beautiful breasts ready to go for her routine.  WOW!!!

If you're a fan of Kitten, as I am, you will want this, IMO.  I had no idea what to expect from it, and while it seems a little pricey for what you get, in the end, I enjoyed it.  If you're a boob guy (as I am, too!), this is a little lacking.  Kitten is the only one that I would call "busty" with most of the girls not having much to speak of.  In other words, don't buy this if you're purely a boob man wanting to see lots of busty girls dancing.  If you're a fan of Kitten specifically, I think it's worth it, and I gave it 4 stars as a result.
